comments.author: Alice Johnson
comments.text: Laptop keeps crashing after latest update.

comments.author: Bob Agent
comments.text: Thanks for reaching out! I'll run diagnostics and push a driver patch.

comments.author: Alice Johnson
comments.text: Patch installed. Laptop seems stable now, thanks!

comments.author: Bob Agent
comments.text: Great news! I'll keep the ticket open for 24 hours just in case.

comments.author: Charlie Rivera
comments.text: VPN is still broken. No one fixed it.

comments.author: Dana Support
comments.text: Sorry for the delay, I'm reviewing the logs now.

comments.author: Charlie Rivera
comments.text: This is ridiculous, do you folks even read the logs?

comments.author: Dana Support
comments.text: I've escalated to networking. Expect an update soon.

comments.author: Dana Support
comments.text: Networking corrected a misconfiguration. Try now.

comments.author: Charlie Rivera
comments.text: Finally it works. Took long enough.

comments.author: Ben Lee
comments.text: Please add read-only access to the finance dashboard.

comments.author: Erin Admin
comments.text: Happy to help. I'll submit the access request and confirm.

comments.author: Erin Admin
comments.text: Access has been granted. You should see the dashboard.

comments.author: Erin Admin
comments.text: ---- Internal ---- *Note: Waiting for audit confirmation before resolving.
